itemDisplayName: Deploy Shibboleth Identity Provider on Ubuntu on a single VM
description: This template deploys Shibboleth Identity Provider as a LAMP application on Ubuntu. It creates a single Ubuntu VM, does a silent install of MySQL, Apache and JDK on it, and then deploys Shibboleth Identity Provider on it.  After the deployment is successful, you can go to /idp/profile/Status to check success.
summary: Deploy Shibboleth Identity Provider on Ubuntu on a single VM.
